comments.author: mrxdaunknown
comments.body: "## Patch Notes 1.12Greetings players!We're excited to bring you another update to our game. This latest patch includes several fixes and improvements to make your gameplay experience even better.First, we're pleased to announce the release of the Parkour Leaderboard. Compete with other players for the best time and win big rewards! This feature is currently in testing phase, but the official leaderboard will begin on 1/3/2023. Get ready to race against the clock and show off your skills!In Parkour mode, we've added a convenient feature for players who want to restart a level or surrender when playing with others. Simply press the "R" key on the keyboard to reset the level and give it another go.We've also fixed a jetpack visual bug that was affecting some players, ensuring that the game looks and feels great for everyone.And finally, for our Football mode, if the player who is currently playing leaves, the game will end, and all spectators will be disconnected.Thank you for playing our game and we hope you enjoy this latest update. Stay tuned for more exciting features and improvements in future patches!"

comments.author: mrxdaunknown
comments.body: A long time has passed since the last update, but the DogeRift team was hard-working:"@everyone  🔥 DogeRift - UPDATE PATCH NOTES Patch 1.3.0 🔥Big Changes:- DOGEF Deprecation: DOGEF is no longer in use. All your DOGEF has been converted to DOGER at a 10:1 ratio. So, for every 10 DOGEF, you get 1 DOGER! In-Game- Currency Integration: All farming, rewards, and shop activities now fully use DOGER! DOGER currency will not be in inflation but we will make burning mechanics very soon with in-game shop.Content Changes:- Full joystick support for both PC and Mobile.- Two new football stadiums with ambient music.- New physics: slide and limiting jump angle make parkour/adventure modes more challenging. Use jetpacks in adventure mode to gain an edge!- Four fresh parkour maps added.- New leaderboards.- Exciting new shop items.- Overhauled game UI for level selection, shop, inventory, leaderboards, main menu, and adventure mode.- Football game mode time changed: now 2 minutes (was 5) and with much tougher bots! Challenge yourself to set high scores.- Choose between three different starting points in Adventure mode.Fixes:- Fixed the football stadium selection UI so mobile controls are disabled properly.- No more jetpack sound on other characters.- Resolved the main menu chest despawn issue.- Characters no longer deselect while exiting the level.- Mages can now see all chests!- Items load quicker in the Inventory. Previously, they sometimes didn't load properly.- All animations in parkour mode now reset when replaying, ensuring fair competition.Coming Soon (in 2-3 weeks):- Final Beta Patch: Global chest, enemies, and lootable materials (ores, herbs). When you loot or defeat an enemy, it'll despawn for others, upping the competitive challenge in exploration and farming.- More zones and decorations for Adventure mode.This patch paves the way for the game's completion and public release. After this final beta patch, we will move forward with the official game launch. Stay tuned! 🚀                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Important for Windows Users:- All Windows users, please reinstall the game. We've updated our servers which should solve earlier installation issues, especially for those on Windows 11.- Expect a quicker install process without the "Update failed" errors.- Get the new game installer here: http://playwindows.dogerift.com/🍏 Mac Users - Heads Up!🔜 Next week, the Mac version will also be updated to utilize our new servers. This should address any ongoing problems with game installation and updates. Stay tuned!"
